Reviews.Title: cheater
Reviews.Author: jackwang
Reviews.Content: This seller is totally a cheater.  The best feature of this phone is the translucent glass which covers the keyboard. but which i got is a plastic which couldn't show the keyboard when the lights on. This is the worst experience i had about online shopping. Never buy goods from this seller!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: overall, good
Reviews.Author: I LOVE HOTPOT
Reviews.Content: THE OVERALL SHOPPING EXPERIENCE IS GOOD. ALTHOUGH THE PHONE HAD A MECHANICAL PROBLEM AND I HAVE TO REQUEST A REFUND, THE CUSTOMER SERVICE RESPONDING FAST AND I GOT THE REFUND WITH NO HASSLE.
